required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of RC48-ADC(Antibody Drug Conjugate) and JS001 to Evaluate the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Subjects With Locally Advanced or Metastatic Urothelial Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Open-label, Single-arm, Phase Ib/II Study of RC48-ADC and JS001 to Evaluate the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Subjects With Locally Advanced or Metastatic Urothelial Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, single-arm, Phase Ib/II investigator-initiated trial of RC48-ADC combined with JS001 to evaluate the safety and pharmacokinetics of subjects with locally advanced or metastatic urothelial cancer

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
through study completion, an average of 1 year

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Numbers of participants with anti-drug antibody positive

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first；assessed up to 60 months
through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve

intervention.description: Recombinant Humanized anti-HER2(Human epidermal growth factor receptor-2) Monoclonal Antibody-MMAE(Monomethyl Auristatin E) Conjugate For Injection and JS001 Injection
